biotools.summary: GPCR-Sequence-Structure-Feature-Extractor (SSFE). Provides template suggestions and homology models of Class A GPCRs. Identifies key sequence and structural motifs in Class A GPCRs to guide template selection and build homology models.

bioschemas.name: GPCR-SSFE
bioschemas.summary: GPCR-Sequence-Structure-Feature-Extractor (SSFE). Provides template suggestions and homology models of Class A GPCRs. Identifies key sequence and structural motifs in Class A GPCRs to guide template selection and build homology models.
